name: Joris
interests: Since I was 20 I have been working on my HBO study CMD. At the moment I am very busy with school, but I also really enjoy playing sports. Since I don't like to do this alone, I am looking for a buddy.

name: Ahmed
interests: Since my youth I have been on the street playing football with my friends. Because we have all gotten a little older, we speak. we no longer meet. So I am looking for new people to play football with again.

name: Isabella
interests: I really enjoy being creative. I have been making paintings of landscapes since I was 12 years old.

name: Lisa
interests: My idol is Tiger Woods and I dream of meeting him one day. I try to go through all Golf tournaments throughout the year to see him play.

name: Ethan
interests: I can be found in the gym 24/7, so I take this very seriously. At the moment I am trying to become a professional snooker player. Would you like to train together?

name: Greta
interests: On my older day I still really enjoy being active. For example, I often go on a walking or cycling holiday in the summer. Last summer I was busy cycling 400km.

name: Rafael
interests: In my spare time I enjoy having a bite to eat and drink with friends. I try to do this at least once a week.

name: Carolina
interests: I play badminton at a very high level. For this I am going to several international tournaments during the year. Would you like to get well together with me?

name: Manos
interests: I am really an outdoors person. That is why I really like exercising in the open air. I prefer to do intensive boxing. I am still looking for a buddy to spar with.

name: Charlotte
interests: Because I have a very busy life, I have little time to exercise. Since I don't like to exercise alone, I do it even less. That is why I am looking for someone to be able to enjoy sports with from time to time.
